query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Posto avea fine al suo ragionamento 2 l’alto dottore, e attento guardava 3 ne la mia vista s’io parea contento;
query.error: **English:** 1 The lofty teacher had brought his discourse to an end, 2 and he gazed intently 3 at my expression to see if I seemed content;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 e io, cui nova sete ancor frugava, 5 di fuor tacea, e dentro dicea: ‘Forse 6 lo troppo dimandar ch’io fo li grava’.
query.error: **English:** 4 and I, whom a new thirst still tormented, 5 was silent outwardly, but said to myself within: ‘Perhaps 6 the excessive questioning that I do is burdensome to him’.
query.result: 4 dan aku, yang masih diganggu oleh dahaga baru, 5 diam di luar, tetapi berkata dalam hati: ‘Mungkin 6 terlalu banyak pertanyaan yang kulakukan membebaninya’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ma quel padre verace, che s’accorse 8 del timido voler che non s’apriva, 9 parlando, di parlare ardir mi porse.
query.error: **English:** 7 But that true father, who perceived 8 the timid will that did not reveal itself, 9 speaking, gave me the courage to speak.
query.result: 7 Tetapi bapa yang sejati itu, yang menyadari 8 keinginan malu-malu yang tidak terungkap, 9 berbicara, memberiku keberanian untuk berbicara.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 13 But I pray you, dear father, 14 that you show me love, to which you lead 15 every good deed and its opposite.
query.result: 13 Tetapi aku mohon padamu, ayahku yang terkasih, 14 agar engkau menunjukkan kasih sayang kepadaku, yang kepadanya engkau arahkan 15 setiap perbuatan baik dan kebalikannya.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 L’animo, ch’è creato ad amar presto, 20 ad ogne cosa è mobile che piace, 21 tosto che dal piacere in atto è desto.
query.error: **English:** 19 The soul, which is created to love quickly, 20 is moved by every pleasing thing, 21 as soon as it is awakened to pleasure by an act.
query.result: 19 Jiwa, yang diciptakan untuk mencintai dengan cepat, 20 tergerak oleh setiap hal yang menyenangkan, 21 segera setelah ia dibangunkan untuk kesenangan oleh suatu tindakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 22 Your apprehensive nature, to be true, 23 draws intention, and within you unfolds it, 24 so that the soul turns its face to it;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 e se, rivolto, inver’ di lei si piega, 26 quel piegare è amor, quell’ è natura 27 che per piacer di novo in voi si lega.
query.error: **English:** 25 and if, turned, it bends toward it, 26 that bending is love, that is the nature 27 that binds itself to you anew for pleasure.
query.result: 25 dan jika, berbalik, ia condong ke arahnya, 26 condongan itu adalah cinta, itulah sifat 27 yang mengikat dirinya kepada Anda lagi untuk kesenangan.
